name: Ni-bot
description:
This Game was create for the #CommunityGameJam.  

The theme was "The Game Is a Liar"

I made it alone in seven days ! I used Unity, Aseprite, Photoshop  and Audacity.

It is a short die and retry, where you play sometime top down shooter and sometime side-scroller shooter. Their is also a little plot!

I hope you enjoy to play, It was a pleasure to make all by my own, I really enjoyed this jam !

ONE PLAYER

Playable with KEYBOARD & MOUSE / GAMEPAD

check my other games on https://cyrolis.itch.io/ and don't hesitate to follow my progression on https://twitter.com/c2monneron !

Credits : https://freesound.org/ for sfx, I modify and mix them in Audacity

                   https://soundimage.org/ for the music (chiptune categorie)

                   DisTOrATion TDeeJay for the boss music
